name: Poly Shooter (xaba)
description:
Poly Shooter is a minimalist, geometric style arcade style shooter game experience, where you need to use your agility to navigate between enemies, and to shoot them down. 

Its main focus is the core game play of classic arcade shooter games, but instead of highly detailed 3D graphics it is built around geometric shapes and visual patterns of geometric kind, giving it a very minimalist design while at the same time keeping what makes these games so much fun. 

◼    As a player you need to fight your way through the 7 levels as they become increasingly harder and see how much points you can gather. 

◼    Gather shards to level up and upgrade your ship along the way.

◼    Visuals of the levels and enemies change in every level.

◼    If it becomes too tough, get upgrades for your ship, and annihilate even your toughest enemies!
